p: After the archaeal, mitochondria and chloroplast sequences removal a total of 35,835 unique ASVs across 54 samples were obtained. Bacterial communities associated with the root endosphere showed the lowest values in alpha diversity (Richness F = 57.3, df = 2, p < 0.001; Shannon F = 56.4, df = 2, p < 0.001; PD F = 61.2, df = 2, p < 0.001), whereas rhizosphere and bulk soil did not differ from each other. Elevation did not affect ASV richness and diversity ( Supplementary Material S5â€“S7). Only the phylogenetic composition of ASVs in soil was significantly higher in HE sites (F = 14.562, df = 1, p = 0.046).
